item.title: RNZ Announces Strategic Review at start of Covid
item.description: 2020-04-15 RNZ Announces Strategic Review at start of Covid low refining margins globally and oversupply in the Asia region. capital structure to maximise value for shareholders.

item.title: RNZ to engage with MBIE
item.description: 2020-04-20 RNZ to engage with MBIE with regard to security of fuel supply for New Zealand importance of refining capability and optionality for fuel supply the contribution of RNZ to the Northland economy the role of RNZâ€™s skills and assets in a transition to lower carbon fuels

item.title: NZ seeks guidance from MBIE on just transition to low carbon future
item.description: 2020-03-06 RNZ seeks guidance from MBIE on just transition to low carbon future RNZ reminds the government RNZ refines imported crude intp 70% of NZ’s transport fuel need. Import of refined products equates to an export of GDP. The refinery is a platform for the production of low emission fuels.

item.title: The Oil and Gas Exploration Ban
item.description: 2018-11-12 Domestic oil and gas exploration ban https://www.rnz.co.nz/news/political/375417/parliament-passes-bill-banning-new-offshore-oil-and-gas-exploration https://www.google.com/search?q=CAB-18-MIN-0306.01&oq=CAB-18-MIN-0306.01&aqs=chrome..69i57.582j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8 https://www.treasury.govt.nz/sites/default/files/2019-01/oia-20180503.pdf https://www.mbie.govt.nz/dmsdocument/6604-crown-minerals-act-1991-review-tranche-two-terms-of-reference-minute-of-decision-proactiverelease-pdf Because of our distaince it’s better to get oiland gas locally.
